name: Roboticized Abyss
description:
The Abyss nearby has been overrun with robotic sharks. Go clear them out and see what's causing this.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys/Dpad - Move/Aim Direction
  • Z Key/A button - float
  • X Key/X Button - fire
  • C Key/LB Button - swap wepons
  • Shift Key/RB Button - Aim
